rdf:Description.dc:title: Psyche
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Louis Marie Anne Couperus (1863–1923)
Benjamin Shepherd Berrington (1845–1934)
Dion Clayton Calthrop (1878–1937)

rdf:Description.dc:description: Psyche, the main character in this tale, is the third daughter of the King of the Kingdom of the Past. This story deals with her relationship with her sister Esmeralda (worldly power), Astra (science), the Chimera, the Sphinx, Eros, who is the monarch of the Present, and the chubby prince Bacchus. Eventually, Psyche finds her destiny with Eros in the Kingdom of the Future.
